title: MCPC-plus全版本
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1277832129 于 2013-5-10 18:54 编辑 

1.5.2版本 本版包括全部快照
本帖全部是服务端JAR  包括全部版本 好吧,不能说全部版本 因为我不可能一下全部发完 对吧
MCPC+的好处有哪些
MCPC+与Bukkit比,mcpc+比bukkit多了一个功能 就是能增加MOD 
服务端MOD安装方法
与客户端安装方法基本相同
整合了Forger modloader
如果不支持上面的API 就不支持安装
比如 把一些MOD拖入JAR的
1.5.2版本（无正式版,只有快照版,请承担BUG后下载,最新版在最上面,越往下越旧）
http://ci.md-5.net/job/MCPC-Plus/417/（2013年5月9日23时38分47秒）
Revision: 9f3d3c4576af5c7f2f28e52f445046bb8ab8f3ce
 http://ci.md-5.net/job/MCPC-Plus/416/  构建 #416 (2013-5-9 23:08:33)Revision: 9f3d3c4576af5c7f2f28e52f445046bb8ab8f3ce
http://ci.md-5.net/job/MCPC-Plus/415/构建 #415 (2013-5-9 22:04:40)Revision: 43e6eb079e5b0bbe40e7ecac898254f426828ad8
后面版本就不发了 如果需要更早的快照版本http://ci.md-5.net/job/MCPC-Plus/415~402之间的数字便可以下载/
1.5.1版本 （含正式版,红字为正式版）http://ci.md-5.net/job/MCPC-Plus/400/构建 #400 (2013-5-7 21:07:22)Revision:全部都不发了··其实我不知道这个有什么用滴~~~求高手解释
http://ci.md-5.net/job/MCPC-Plus/398/构建 #398 (2013-5-7 20:55:13)
 http://ci.md-5.net/job/MCPC-Plus/397/构建 #397 (2013-5-6 23:00:42)以上均为重要版本 注：有些版本我没发,是因为BUG严重
1.4.7版本（含正式版,蓝字为正式版）
http://ci.md-5.net/job/MCPC-Plus-Legacy/ 最终正式版 Project MCPC-Plus-Legacyhttp://ci.md-5.net/job/MCPC-Plus/247/ 构建 #247 (2013-3-18 12:00:49)这些就是1.4.7的版本了,作者真是更新得勤啊 几分钟就是一个··
1.2.5版本http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=117612&page=1#pid2062291 不是我发的帖

1.4.7版源代码 （作者没有发布1.5的）
https://github.com/MinecraftPortCentral/MCPC-Plus/tree/MC147

MODS 官方推荐
基本的可以去 http://www.minecraftforum.net/forum/51-minecraft-mods/    找以下是官方推荐使用的MOD 保证兼容 但是是1.4.7的版本 在1.5 的发后我们会更新滴官方特别提供了的MOD下载网址 http://www.mcportcentral.co.za/index.php?board=62.0
ChickenChunks1.3.1.0+(original thread)Latest version of ChickenChunks allows setting cleanuptime=0 in config/ChickenChunks.cfg which will disable the chunk cleanup (fixes void chunks) (TODO: other incompatibilities?)Easy Crafting1.1.3agaricusEasyCrafting-1.1.3+mcpc.zipFixes null recipe crashSource
IndustrialCraft^21.115.218bloodshotindustrialcraft-2_1.115.218-lf-MCPC-R2.jarClient Requirements: IC2 1.115.218 which can be found here :http://ic2api.player.to:8080/job/IC2_lf/NOTE: This new build includes muCkk's config and Bukkit events. Please let me know of any bugs.Credits: IC2 Dev Team as creator of IC2, muCkk, Maeyaniewebsite: http://www.industrial-craft.net/ , http://forum.industrial-craft.net/Permission : http://forum.industrial-craft.net/index.php?page=Thread&threadID=7994&s=c881cd1a0799172bcab272b652aeef81e89d8dcb
Mo' Creatures4.5.1bloodshotPatch: MCPC_Plus-MoC451_Despawn_FIX.zipProblem: All tamed animals except horses despawn when they shouldn't.Recipear1.1+(original thread)Player API1.2+(original thread)Use MCPC+ versionSmart Moving12.3+(original thread)


Plugins （插件）插件名称版本搬运工下载地址介绍（英语）Dynmapv1.4+(original site)Several versions are available. For best results, use DynmapForge with DynmapCBBridgeLogBlock1.70 + [4096] Block ID supportbloodshotLogBlock-MCPC.jarIf using this with an existing LogBlock database, it will attempt to autoconvert a few existing table columns from TINYINT to SMALLINT. This will only cause a delay on initial startup for large databases but should be fairly quick for small ones.LoadControlcontrol world loading for Bukkit (useful to unload Mystcraft ages on startup, etc.)LWC4.3.1bloodshotLWC.jarfixes "Could not pass event PlayerInteractEvent" error.Author: HidendraLicense: included with jar
ProtocolLib2.2.0+(original site)Plugins authors should also consider depending on MinecraftReflection, as it gives access to NMS classes regardless of their name thanks to the compatibility of MCPC.SilkSpawners3.0+(original site)Supports mobs from mods; entity ID dumpTowny Advanced0.82.0.2+(original site)Supports nested world folders (e.g. Mystcraft)Disable version check if needed"java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.bukkit.entity.minecart.StorageMinecart" means you're using a plugin for 1.5 on 1.4.7
WorldEdit5.5.2+ (#1365+)(original site)Latest builds support 4096 block ID, custom tile entities, and fast NMS block editing on MCPC+
注意事项服务端的插件和MOD 和普通的安装方法一样  无要注意的
MOD可以在MCBBS下载 支持大部分MOD 不支持 人工用某软件制作的MOD 
插件也能在MCBBS 下载 建议在MCBBS 下载 不行就去 BUKKIT.ORG 
1.5.1mod大全索引http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-35536-1-1.html

DOS 启动代码
@ECHO OFF
color 2
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
CD /D "%BINDIR%"
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe"   -Xmx1024M -jar 名称.jar
PAUSE
